name: Tobias And The Dark Sceptres (itch)
description:
An epic platforming puzzle-adventure, 13 years in the making!

Star of the viral video The Game That Time Forgot!

A Zelda rip-off that is nothing like Zelda. A labour of love. 13 years mis-spent.

  • Solve ingenious puzzles
  • Run, jump and swipe through fantastical locations
  • Fight a huge cast of strange enemies
  • Battle multi-stage bosses
  • Play through an epic cinematic story

Support the game - buy the soundtrack.
